Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Fusarium graminearum (IC50=15 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=102 µg/ml), F. verticillioides (IC50=8.5 µg/ml), Diplodia maydis (IC50=12.5 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity. Inhibits hyphal development in P. infestans (IC50=25.5 µg/ml), but not release of zoospores. At concentrations above 100 µg/ml, induces morphological changes such as lysis of hyphae and sporangia in P. infestans.

Literature.Title: Seed defensins of barnyard grass Echinochloa crusgalli (L.) Beauv.
Literature.Author: Odintsova TI, Rogozhin EA, Baranov Y, Musolyamov AKh, Yalpani N, Egorov TA, Grishin EV.
